parameters.prompt: synthwave, desert blues, nostalgic, hypnotic, electric guitar, analog synth, tape wobble
parameters.lyrics: [verse] Sandstorms hum in radio static / Neon palms sway in the heat mirage [chorus] We’re lost in the dunes of time / Chasing echoes of a fading rhyme [verse] Your shadow flickers like film grain / A Super 8 memory, half-erased [chorus] We’re lost in the dunes of time / Chasing echoes of a fading rhyme [bridge] The jukebox plays a backwards prayer / (Rewind me back to you) [outro] Midnight dissolves into turquoise dawn / The cassette finally clicks, and you’re gone
